TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OperationInfo extends System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents the information for a contract operation defined in a workflow service.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo> class is used to define service contract information for a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity> activity.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo> class can be used only with a workflow-first service. For more information about workflow-first services, see [Workflow Service Authoring Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/995bf98e-5b51-4c49-802b-c4e6293dd530).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets information on the operation to specify that communication between the service and a client is one-way.
Docs.value: if the operation supports one-way communication; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The default value is `false`.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to access the `IsOneWay` property.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of objects that represents the parameter definitions used by the operation.
Docs.value: A collection of objects that represents the parameter definitions used by the operation when called by a client.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `Parameters` collection will contain one element for each parameter in the method signature of the operation, plus one element for the return value of the operation.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to access the `Parameters` property.
[!code-csharp[OperationInfo#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationinfo/cs/operationinfosnippets.cs#4)] [!code-vb[OperationInfo#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationinfo/vb/operationinfosnippets.vb#4)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the of an operation.
Docs.value: A object used by the operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The default value is `null`, which means that the protection level is not set.
